sense.def:
To dedicate oneself to something
pomeni nečemu posvetiti veliko časa in truda, ker mislimo, da je pomembno.

seg.quote: ...a man who had dedicated himself to his work.

sense.def:
To dedicate something to someone
pomeni izjaviti, da je recimo knjiga ali skladba napisana za nekega človeka v znamenje naklonjenosti ali spoštovanja.

seg.quote: She dedicated her first book to her husband.
